name: Stellar Invasion (JacquesAV)
description:
Defend the earth from an incoming alien invasion! Move in the mobile turret and fire rockets to take them down, but be warned, these aliens do not take kindly to you interfering with their plans, and will become more relentless until you can successfully destroy enough of them to scare them off.

Created in the Processing development environment in my first year of university. This was meant as a supplementary project for the programming exams given at the end of the first semester.

Although used primarily for a programming exam, this served as a strong foundation for all future code work as it helped teach and enforce general coding convention.
